|brand = Iomega |model = StorCenter |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = ix4-300d |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;MV78230;ARMADA XP, PJ4 Core; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v7 |cpu1spd = 1.33 GHz<!-- 1.0 / 1.2 / 1.33 / 1.6 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1318; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:D0:B8
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = SMBios;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATA |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_sata_num = 4 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 4.74 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup, LCD display |addchip = SATA Controller;Marvell;88SX7042;;1; ,,, USB 3.0 Controller;NEC;D720200F1;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B009O7Z226 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B009O7Z21C |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN2 country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *[[Iomega StorCenter ix4-300d]] - Network Storage 4-bay (35565) :Processor: [[Marvell]] MV78230 (Armada XP) @1.3GHz (Dual Core) :Memory: 512MB DDR3; Hard drives: 4x 1TB 3.5" (SATA II) :Ports: 1x GbE (RJ45), 1x USB 3.0, 2x USB 2.0 :LAN: [[Marvell]] 88E1318 (Alaska) GbE (10/100/1000) :SATA Controller: [[Marvell]] 88SX7042 :USB 3.0 Controller: NEC D720200F1
*[[Iomega StorCenter Pro ix4-300d]] - Network Storage 4-bay :4 bay hot-swap NAS from Lenovo (formerly Iomega) :Processor: [[Intel Atom]] D525 @1.8GHz (Quad Core) :Memory: 4GB DDR2; Hard drives: 4x 1TB (SATA II) :Ports: 2x GbE (RJ45), 1x USB 3.0, 2x USB 2.0
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.storagereview.com/iomega_storcenter_px4300d_review Review on '''StorageReview'''] *[http://cheklab.ru/archives/4228 Review on '''ChekLab'''] (RU) *[https://www.channelpronetwork.com/news/lenovoemc-debuts-improved-ix4-400d-four-bay-nas-ces-and-weve-got-all-details PR on '''ChannelProNetwork'''] {{See also|Iomega StorCenter Pro ix4-300d}}
